Commands.Name: Help
Commands.Description: Sends a link to the GitHub repository
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a link to the GitHub repository

Commands.Name: Ping
Commands.Description: Sends a ping message, if the bot is online
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a ping message, if the bot is online

Commands.Name: Suggest
Commands.Description: Suggest or report anything concerning the bot
ParameterDescriptions: Suggest a new feature
Report a bug

Commands.Name: Fuck
Commands.Description: Fucks the given user
ParameterDescriptions: Fucks the given user
Fucks the given user and adds then emote

Commands.Name: Remind
Commands.Description: Sets timed or non-timed for given users
ParameterDescriptions: Sets a reminder for the given user
Sets a reminder for the given user, that will be triggered after the given time

Commands.Name: Rafk
Commands.Description: Resumes you last afk status
ParameterDescriptions: Resumes your last afk status

Commands.Name: Check
Commands.Description: Check afk states or reminders
ParameterDescriptions: Checks the afk status of the given user
Sends information about the reminder. Must be a running reminder

Commands.Name: Tuck
Commands.Description: Tucks the given user to bed
ParameterDescriptions: Tucks the given user to bed

Commands.Name: Gachi
Commands.Description: Sends a random gachi song
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a random gachi song

Commands.Name: Massping
Commands.Description: Pings all users in the current channel
ParameterDescriptions: Pings all users in the current channel
Pings all users in the current channel and adds the custom emote between each name

Commands.Name: Set
Commands.Description: Set things like channel prefix or emote
ParameterDescriptions: Sets the channel's command prefix to the given prefix. A prefix can be as long as 10 chars
Sets the emote in front message to the given one. An emote can be as long as 20 chars
Sets your location for the weather command

Commands.Name: Unset
Commands.Description: Unset things like channel prefix or emote
ParameterDescriptions: Unsets the command prefix in the current channel
Unsets the reminder with the given ID
Unsets the emote in front in the current channel

Commands.Name: Math
Commands.Description: Calculates the solution of the given mathematical expression
ParameterDescriptions: Sends the solution of the given mathematical expression

Commands.Name: Coinflip
Commands.Description: Flips a coin
ParameterDescriptions: Sends the result of a coinflip

Commands.Name: Spotify
Commands.Description: Sends songs users are listening to on Spotify
ParameterDescriptions: Sends the current playing spotify song of the broadcaster, if registered
Sends your current playing spotify song, if registered
Sends the current playing spotify song of the given user, if registered

Commands.Name: Chatters
Commands.Description: Sends the amount of chatters in channels
ParameterDescriptions: Sends the amount of chatters in the current channel
Sends the amount of chatters in the given channel

Commands.Name: Join
Commands.Description: Joins the given channel
ParameterDescriptions: Joins the given channel. Only available for owners.

Commands.Name: CSharp
Commands.Description: Executes the given C# code
ParameterDescriptions: Executes the given C# code

Commands.Name: Fill
Commands.Description: Sends a message that only contains the given emote up to its maximum length
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a message that only contains the given emote up to its maximum length

Commands.Name: Vanish
Commands.Description: Timeouts the sender for 1s
ParameterDescriptions: Timeouts the sender for 1s

Commands.Name: SongRequest
Commands.Description: Adds songs to user Spotify queues
ParameterDescriptions: Adds the Spotify song to the broadcaster's queue, if registered and enabled
Adds the source's Spotify song to the target's queue, if registered and enabled. Use "me" short for your username. If the target is not "me", the source can only be "me".

Commands.Name: Skip
Commands.Description: Skips to the next song in the broadcaster's queue
ParameterDescriptions: Skips to the next song in the broadcaster's queue, if registered and enabled

Commands.Name: Id
Commands.Description: Sends Twitch user IDs
ParameterDescriptions: Sends your Twitch user ID
Sends the Twitch user ID of the given user

Commands.Name: Chatterino
Commands.Description: Sends usefull Chatterino links, e.g. for download
ParameterDescriptions: Sends usefull Chatterino links, e.g. for download

Commands.Name: Chatterino7
Commands.Description: Sends usefull Chatterino7 links, e.g. for download
ParameterDescriptions: Sends usefull Chatterino7 links, e.g. for download

Commands.Name: Pick
Commands.Description: Sends one item picked from all provided ones
ParameterDescriptions: Sends one item picked from all provided ones

Commands.Name: BanFromFile
Commands.Description: Bans all users that match the regex in a multiline file
ParameterDescriptions: Bans all users that match the regex in a multiline file. Currently restricted to moderators

Commands.Name: Stream
Commands.Description: Sends information about a stream
ParameterDescriptions: Sends information about the current channel's stream
Sends information about the given channel's stream

Commands.Name: Code
Commands.Description: Sends a link to the code of the provided command
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a link to the code of the provided command

Commands.Name: Listen
Commands.Description: Lets you listen along with another user on Spotify
ParameterDescriptions: Lets you listen along with another user

Commands.Name: Leave
Commands.Description: Leaves the provided channel
ParameterDescriptions: Leaves the provided channel

Commands.Name: Invalidate
Commands.Description: Invalidates all database caches
ParameterDescriptions: Invalidates all database caches

Commands.Name: Slots
Commands.Description: Rolls slots and picks 3 of all third party emotes
ParameterDescriptions: Rolls slots and picks 3 of all third party emotes
Rolls slots and picks 3 of all third party emotes matching the provided regex

Commands.Name: Weather
Commands.Description: Sends weather data for the given city
ParameterDescriptions: Sends weather data for the given city

Commands.Name: Formula1
Commands.Description: Sends information about the next Formula 1 event
ParameterDescriptions: Sends information about the next Formula 1 event
Sends weather data for the Formula 1 location

Commands.Name: Reddit
Commands.Description: Sends a random reddit post of the top hot 100
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a random reddit post of the top hot 50

Commands.Name: Guid
Commands.Description: Sends a GUID
ParameterDescriptions: Sends a GUID

Commands.Name: Kotlin
Commands.Description: Executes the given Kotlin code
ParameterDescriptions: Executes the given Kotlin code

Commands.Name: Hangman
Commands.Description: Starts a hangman game
